subject: Re: [junit] TestSuite problem
msgSnippet: ... With respect, this makes the test-case count wrong and does not solve the underlying problem that the Project-level suite is not picking up the
messageBody:
Sandy Ward wrote:

> Hey Bo,
>
> If you include a method like:
>
> public void testPlaceHolder() {
> }
>
> Then the error about not having any test will disappear. The error message
> you are getting is a result of JUnit expecting test methods in these classes

With respect, this makes the test-case count wrong and does not solve
the underlying problem that the Project-level suite is not picking up
the Package-level suites.

Take care.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
